body:
Thanks very much !! :o)


Lucio


.Yes, it is superfluous -- you are correct.  It didn't used to be the  
.default, so I left the option in there for backwards compatibility.   
.The -c option was added when -e was made the default, many years ago.
.
.-Greg
.
